Topic.Title: American idioms: give voice to (something)

Message.Msg: This Silence "This silence, this moment, every moment, if it's genuinely inside you, brings what you need. There's nothing to believe. Only when I stopped believing in myself did I come into this beauty. Sit quietly, and listen for a voice that will say, 'Be more silent.' Die and be quiet. Quietness is the surest sign that you've died. Your old life was a frantic running from silence. Move outside the tangle of fear-thinking. Live in silence." by Rumi

Message.Title: Google Making It Harder To Steal On Internet? LOL!
Message.Msg: Really, this Google news regarding a new "feature" to its search algorithm that will make it harder to find pirated material is garbage. If they really wanted to help reduce piracy, how about filtering out search results that contain terms such as cracked, hacked, warez, etc. when searching for software? Simply don't return a search result for software if terms such as these are used within the keywords, title or body of a page containing info about a software product. Don't make me choke.....you'll never see that, since it would actually be a good idea, and good ideas cut back on the amount of pages viewed that contain Google Ads. And Google Ads are all that really matters and not the struggling software firm getting ripped off more easily because of Google's lack of illegal content filtering.

Message.Title: Finally, GOOG is moving
Message.Msg: And my prediction of new all time highs (above $750) by year end is coming closer to reality. $669.76 right now. What you guys don't understand is just how dominant Google is in so many spaces. Apple can sue all it wants, but the problem is that Google's quantity will probably overwhelm Apple's quality, just like Microsoft killed Apple in the 80's and 90's. Well, maybe not just like. I think Apple will continue making decent products for at least another 5 years, maybe even for 10 years. But Apple has lost its genius. The next time they flip their magic coin, it will come up tails for the first time in over a decade. The stock will tank. Google has nothing but blue skies above. mothra
